name: Pacific Assault - Armored Beast
description:
Synopsis

1940. The war is tearing the world appart.

But hope arises, as you are sent on a very dangerous mission to defeat the ultimate weapon : the Armored Beast. 

Controls

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Space bar to shoot

Credits
 Alan Kilby (https://twitter.com/alanskrt) : Game Art

Ulric Debaert (https://twitter.com/UDebaert) : Level Design, Project Management

Myself (https://twitter.com/BNossin) : AI Design, AI Programming
